datasource_id_youtubeMetric.message:
Gets statistic from page meta data. Restore likes\ dislikes based on rating data for video
Currently most accurate method if availabe

datasource_id_sponsorsBlock.message:
Collects data from user sended actions (from extensions that use same API).
Uses its own data base https://sponsor.ajay.app/database

datasource_id_ryda.message:
Gets data from YouTube API, then stores the data in a database for caching (cached for around 2-3 days).
All collected statistic about videos is stored constatntly
and will used in future to replace YouTube API statistic when it will be unavailabe

datasource_id_catface.message: Cache server for YouTube API \ Meta data get results. It's not store all data constantly.

datasources_help.message: Extension gets information about dislikes / likes count by making request to data sources by priority

datasources_help_1.message: The count may differ based on the source from which the data was obtained in accordance with the order of requests.

datasources_help_2.message: Currently supported SponsorBlock API (currently for testing), ReturnYoutubeDislikes.com, Catface.ru. Read more in description section of each source.

datasources_help_3.message: By default, the order of data retrieval is [data from YouTube Meta + cache] -> [APY by ReturnYoutubeDislikes.com].

datasources_help_4.message: For now, the metric is the most accurate source. The receipt of information in this way can be limited at any time. Depending on what actions YouTube takes, the order and sources may change so that the extension can continue to work.

datasources_help_5.message: It is recommended to change the order only in case of problems in operation.

datasources_help_6.message: You can restrict sending actions (like / dislike videos) or receiving data from separate sources.

chik_advice.message: If all works well, don't edit addition options

option_showSource.message: Add notice about data source in popup
